body_html:
Same thing happens using gcc-5.4.1 on Debian 9. This is my build command:

bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --copt=-msse4.1 --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
body_text:
Same thing happens using gcc-5.4.1 on Debian 9.  This is my build command:
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --copt=-msse4.1 --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
body:
Same thing happens using ``gcc-5.4.1`` on Debian 9.  This is my build command:

```
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --copt=-msse4.1 --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
